summary: Hugh Jackman loda Kevin Feige ed il suo ruolo nel casting di Wolverine
title: Hugh Jackman loda Kevin Feige ed il suo ruolo nel casting di Wolverine
body:
Hugh Jackman loda Kevin Feige ed il suo ruolo nel casting di Wolverine

Hugh Jackman potrà anche aver finito con Wolverine, ma questo non significa che non sia sicuro del futuro del franchise, specialmente ora che Fox sta per vendere il Gruppo Fox alla Disney. Non è chiaro come, quando o se vedremo gli X-Men interagire con i Vendicatori, ma con Kevin Feige al timone, Jackman ha pochi dubbi.

Durante un’intervista lunga e divertente con MTV News, Josh Horowitz ha…

View On WordPress

title: And From The Dark
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Kq7glC

by araydre, Neutralchaos

Tony should learn to listen when told why arcane books should not be read aloud, even if its technically not him doing the reading.

Sideblog for headcanons: mi-does-hcs

summary: Rare Ship Thursday:  I like Pepper/Natasha, which I have also seen called “Black Pepper”.  I think they bonded over Tony and his...
question: Rare Ship Thursday:  I like Pepper/Natasha, which I have also seen called “Black Pepper”.  I think they bonded over Tony and his erratic behaviour in IM2.  FrostStrange has honestly never occurred to me before but I think it’s really interesting, maybe they have some kind of rivals to lovers dynamic over their proficiency in magic use!
answer:
I never heard it before but I like that shipname!

And yes, I think that they could totally bond over Tony. And him being the main theme of their conversation until they slowly switch to other things (open up to each other).

I kind of was on the Froststrange ship from the beginning XD

Knowing that Tom and Benedict are best friends in real life made me curious what kind of relationship their characters would have. And I kind of love that it seems that they have a rather hate/rivalry relationship, and I always had a little weakness for such ships (but of course since they don’t had had much screentime together you can’t really say much about their relationship. Except that it is definitely not love at first side^^)

I think magic is definitely what brings them together (or at least helps them). If it is that they want to better than the over or that they just bond over it (discussing the difference between the magic, showing each over what they can do and where the limits are,…)

I think magic is definitely what brings them together (or at least helps them). If it is that they want to better than the over or that they just bond over it (discussing the difference between the magic, showing each over what they can do and where the limits are,…)

summary: His actual name is James Buchanan Barnes right? So naturally you would call him James, but no, we call him by his middle name....
body:
Okay but let’s take a moment to think about Bucky‘s name

His actual name is James Buchanan Barnes right? So naturally you would call him James, but no, we call him by his middle name. Nickname #1

We shorten this middle name to Bucky. Nickname #2

AND THEN STEVE CALLS HIM BUCK. HOW MANY NICKNAMES DOES THIS MAN NEED

blog.name: nobleelfwarrior
blog.title: Screaming Into The Void
blog.description: The acclectic thoughts I want to tell someone, but not really anyone in particular.  Includes activism, anthropology, toilets, and DnD

title: Aunt May
body:
I’m always confused when people make a big deal of how Aunt May gets younger in every reboot because my little brother is close the Peter Parker’s age and my youngest aunt is about 35 and my oldest aunt is about 55.  So, my oldest aunt is graying, but the Rosemary Harris is the age of my great-grandma, Sally Field is the age of my grandma, and Marisa Tomei is the age of my aunts. If you ask me, this is a step up. Even taking into account the ages of the actresses when their film happened, none of them are even close to my aunts age except Marisa Tomei.

I get that she’s younger than she is in the comics, but I think it makes more sense for her to be in her fifties instead of her nineties.
